item.description: THE BEST PLACE TO WATCH THE TALL SHIPS AS THEY LEAVE RI IS FROM DEWEY FIELD ON THE NAVY BASE IN NEWPORT - THE EVENT IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC - GATES OPEN AT 12 - PLENTY OF FREE PARKING BUT GET IN LINE EARLY AT GATE 1 - THERE WILL BE 2 BANDS PLAYING ALL DAY - FOOD CONCESSIONS - WILL BE A GREAT DAY!
item.how_to_find_us: FRONT ROW OF CHAIRS IN FRONT OF THE BAND

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: TALL SHIPS PARADE FROM THE NAVAL BASE
